      • PartOfSpeechTaggerResult

        public PartOfSpeechTaggerResult(java.lang.String text,
                        java.lang.String corpusConfig,
                        java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sentences,
                        java.util.List<java.util.List<edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.corpuslinguistics.adornedword.AdornedWord>> adornedSentences,
                        boolean outputTEI,
                        boolean outputReg,
                        boolean outputTCF)
        Create populated part of speech tagger results.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to tag.
        corpusConfig - Corpus configuration.
        sentences - Word and sentences.
        adornedSentences - Adorned sentences.
        outputTEI - Output XML as fragmentary TEI.
        outputReg - Add standard spelling attribute to TEI output.
        outputTCF - Output XML in WebLicht TCF format.
